name: The Devil's Blades are Bloody Playthings
name_original: The Devil's Blades are Bloody Playthings
description:
You have been banished to hell, your eternal punishment is to entertain the devil in their favorite blood sport.

Made for the Beginners Circle Jam #4

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

MOUSE - Aim

Left Mouse/CLT - Shoot

Browser version is out of date, use the windows version for the best experience.
